message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal! Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but $175 is a bit too high for me. I can do $120.

Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $120 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down to $150, which is still a great deal for you considering the value of this product. Let me know if you're willing to meet me halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $150, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can do $130.

Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but I'm still not able to go any lower than $140. This is a fair price considering the quality and value of this product. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $140 is still a bit too high for me. I can do $125.
